about_the_game:
Remind yourself of the unforgettable adventure time you had with Yella with the opening song and BGMs of the game Vampires’ Melody!

This DLC contains:
✿ Embedded music player where you can interact with Yella while listening to the tunes.
✿ Full HD wallpapers in ultra quality.
✿ Full HD MV 『Oath Melody』 by DZS漫音 and project lights.
✿ OST composed by project lights and SakuraGame that contains:
Theme Songs——
『Oath Melody』
『Oath Melody - Short ver』
BGM——
『Welcome to Vampires' Melody』
『Peaceful Day』
『Happy Playground』
『Stay Together』
『Candlelight』
『Nothing, Everything』

How to use:
After purchasing, click “EXTRA” in the main menu of the game to enter the music player.
Also, you can find all the content in the “ListeningWithYou” folder in the install folder of the game.
